title: Push
description: Do 10 pushups or any variation of a pushup!

title: Climb
description: Go walk up and down at least 8 flights of stairs!

title: Jump
description: Do as many jumping-jacks as you can for 1 minute!

title: Plank
description: Hold a plank for at least 30 seconds! Do this at least 3 times!

title: Stand with one leg
description: Close your eye and stand with only one leg on the ground

title: sun-salutation
description: Stand up straight, facing the sun, stand up stright and do sun salutation. these postures are a good way to keep the body in shape and the mind calm and healthy.

title: Brisk walking
description: Go for a brisk walk, walk fast but do not run.

title: Dance
description: Dance with your favorite party beats
